Key Match Events: Dinesh Karthik scored his maiden fifty in T20I
Avesh Khan returned his career-best figures (4/18)
South African batters collapsed to 87 for nine in 16.5 overs
South Africa's lowest total in T20 Internationals in India
Miscellaneous Highlights: Temba Bavuma retired hurt after a diving attempt
Quinton de Kock was run out after getting a 'yes and no' from Dwaine Pretorious
Ruturaj Gaikwad was the first one to depart after the extra bounce from Lungi Ngidi induced the outside edge
Rishabh Pant was trying to find his range at the other end while Hardik Pandya was hammering Tabraiz Shamsi for successive sixes
The most attractive stroke of Karthik's innings was the slog sweep off Dwaine Pretorius that sailed over deep square leg
